# HealthCheck Robots.txt
# Last updated: 2026-02-22

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap (auto-generated by Next.js)
Sitemap: https://www.healthcalc.xyz/sitemap.xml

# Disallow crawling of API and development areas
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /dev/

# Crawl delay for specific bots
User-agent: AhrefsBot
Crawl-delay: 10

User-agent: SemrushBot
Crawl-delay: 10

User-agent: MJ12bot
Crawl-delay: 10

# Allow Google Image crawler to index images
User-agent: Googlebot-Image
Allow: /images/
